document_data.mainbody:
Belphendors was a shop in Khôltar, south Faerûn, that sold plumbing supplies, pipes, valves, and fittings circa the .
Belphendors was on the south side of Hael Way just to the west of Elduskryns Fiery Creations and across the street from Anthormbrur, the fancy home of the Horthander family.
